“ Pursuant to the provisions of ORG CARDINAL and CARDINAL of the LAW of GPE , ... ORG does not consider it necessary to remit the case for fresh consideration to the first - instance court , because that would contradict Articles CARDINAL and CARDINAL of the LAW of Ukraine , Sections CARDINAL and CARDINAL of LAW governing the status of ORG and its tasks of ensuring the legitimacy in the administration of justice , and would entail quashing of the legitimate judgment of CARDINAL DATE , which would be contrary to LAW .
